name: 狄雅南
objective:
本課程之重點在於將熱力學機基本定律，應用於較為實際的化工問題上。主要內容包括：熱力學及輸送現象性質之估算方法，氣液相平衡及液液相平衡在分離製程的應用等.
The objectives of this course are to apply principles of thermodynamics in practical chemical processes. The contents 
of the curricula are 1) estimation of the thermodynamic and transport properties of fluids and solids, 2) vapor-liquid equilibrium as well as liquid-liquid equilibrium for separation processes application.
schedule:
1st week: Phase equilibria introduction
2nd week: Phase equilibria introduction, vapor-liquid equilibrium
3rd week: vapor-liquid equilibrium
4th week: liquid-liquid equilibrium
5th week: liquid-liquid equilibrium
6th week: liquid-liquid equilibrium 
7th week: liquid-liquid equilibrium
8th week: vapor-liquid-liquid equilibrium
9th week: Midterm exam 
10th week: vapor-liquid-liquid equilibrium
11th week: vapor-liquid-liquid equilibrium
12th week: applications of phase equilibria in the distillation
13th week: applications of phase equilibria in the reactive distillation
14th week: applications of phase equilibria in the extraction column
15th week: applications of phase equilibria in the decanter
16th week: Review and problems in industries
17th week: Group presentation
18th week: Group presentation

materials:
1.  Walas, S. M., Phase Equilibria in Chemical Engineering, (1985), Butterworth-Heinemann, https://doi.org/10.1016/C2013-0-04304-6.
2. Poling, B. E., Prausnitz, J. M., and O’Connell, J. P., The Properties of Gases and Liquids, 5th ed., McGraw-Hill, New York, NY (2001).
3. Geankoplis, C. J., Transport Processes and Unit Operations, 4th Ed., Allyn and Bacon series in engineering, Boston, Massachusetts (1978).
